11.content: Now, will she be alone in this story or with her firiends, and which one(s).
11.title: Alone or Together

114.content:
It had been a year or so since Jodi had discovered the truth about Juniper Lee's social life. this coupled with the fact that Ophelia had only recently made the discovery herself made some things easier on June. Especially since she and her two best friends had been allowed to transfer to the Orchid Bay Girls' Academy on 13th street and 7th avenue.

But this was another calm and restful day in Orchid Bay. The birds were chirping, the common folk going about their daily lives. And the Te Xuan Ze, Juniper Lee, was once again battling an evil beast.

"I have no idea what pit of hell you hail from," said Juniper Lee at the top of her lungs, "but I am going to send you back, with or without your head still attached!"

"You do realize he has a second head," said Jodi stating the obvious. And just like that, the beast smacked both heads against a rock ledge, causing him to dematerialize.

--- moments later -----

"That fight was sure anticlimactic," said Ophelia as she, Jodi, and Juniper went to their physical education class.
As the three girls walked to class, Jodi Irwin noticed a snack machine being installed. "When did that get there?" asked Jodi.

"Um, apparently just recently," Juniper said. "It even looks like one of those half-refrigerated half-unrefrigerated machines. I wonder whats in it?"

With that, the girls looked at the selection. Most of the stuff looked normal, with the usual selection of candies, chips, etcetera. But something caught their eyes. Their were three items marked as newly released, with the usual lettering in bright colors surrounded by a starburst-shaped speech bubble. One item that caught their attention the most was a frozen item called Maddie Po's Bulge pies. The other two things were both bagged like chips. One was entitled 'Button poppers,' whereas the other was named Bellystuffers.

"You two go and get changed, I'm gonna try one of these out," said Juniper. She then selected...
114.title: Yet Another Calm & Average Day
